isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - INSTALL - ROADRANGER VALVE

step1.para: Install the Roadranger valve cover and the three air lines ( Figure 304).

figure.caption: Figure 304. Install Roadranger Valve Cover and Air Lines

step1.para: Install the jam nut on the shift lever. Thread the Roadranger valve on the shift lever and secure by tightening jam nut against valve ( Figure 305).

figure.caption: Figure 305. Install and Tighten Jam Nut

step1.para: Connect the red air line to the "S" or Supply Port, and the black air line to the "P" or End Port of the slave valve ( Figure 306). Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 306. Connect Red Air Line to Supply Port and Black Air Line to End Port

step1.para: Connect the red air line to the "S" or Supply Port and the black air line to the "P" Port on the Roadranger valve ( Figure 307). Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 307. Connect Red Air Line to Supply Port and Black Air Line to "P" Port

step1.para: Connect the blue air line to the "SP" or Splitter Port on the Roadranger valve (inset, Figure 308). Connect the blue air line to the splitter cylinder cover ( Figure 308). Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 308. Connect Blue Air Line to Splitter Port and to Splitter Cylinder Cover

step1.para: Position valve cover on Roadranger valve and secure by tightening the two mounting screws in the cover ( Figure 309

figure.caption: Figure 309. Position Valve Cover on Roadranger Valve
